alert.note: Alert for Norfolk, Portsmouth (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AFFECT ...THE CITY OF NORFOLK AND THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH... At 544 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Portsmouth, or over Churchland, moving northeast at 45 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail are possible with this storm. Locations impacted include... Old Dominion University, Norfolk State University, Downtown Norfolk, Ocean View, Downtown Portsmouth, Norfolk, Portsmouth, Norfolk International, Norfolk NAS, Ghent, Cradock, Norview, Wards Corner and Willoughby Spit. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may cause localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
